      • notchToBlockFace

        public static BlockFace notchToBlockFace(int notch)
        Notch uses a 0-5 to mean DOWN, UP, NORTH, SOUTH, WEST, EAST in that order all over. This method is convenience to convert for us.
        Returns:
        BlockFace the BlockFace represented by this number
